articles.description: Hertsmere has the highest coronavirus death rate in the whole of the UK, national figures show.
articles.content:
Hertsmere has the highest coronavirus death rate in the whole of the UK, national figures show.
Office for National Statistics (ONS) data shows that Hertsmere has a Covid-19 death rate of 159.3 per … [+9150 chars]
